overview: Before Pineapple Express even had a trailer I made a comedy meets crime drama called "All the Girls Love Blood" from February to Sept 2008.With barely 600$ to the budget and a cast of talented actors and Cheesecake Factory waitresses I put my heart and soul into my 5th feature.Ivan Neurotic provided a home made gib crane he made himself and my friends provided music.Then...nothing happened.Due to no Youtube crowd or social media the film got passed around and lost until now.Please enjoy my film_I gave my life to make it and could use a break.
title: All the Girls Love Blood
